Name: Red Dye
Description: A natural textile dye with pure color, used for coloring or recoloring garments, accessories, and other products.
Description2$english:
Due to the natural origin of dye materials, the greatest challenge faced by dye craftsmen is accurately correcting color differences. Additionally, the humid climate conditions in Asterleeds cause even the color correction swatches to undergo subtle changes over time.
——Therefore, who can guarantee that the colors after many years will still be the same as the earliest batch?

recipes.Name: Red Dye
recipes.Des: A natural dye with pure color, used for coloring garments, accessories, and other products in red.
